title: RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Datasheet > RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Module Overview
content: RAK12040 is a WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Module that extends the WisBlock system with an AMG8833 chip from Panasonic. It comes with a ready-to-use software library and tutorial, making it easy to build a temperature data acquisition system. Temperature data is interfaced via I2C. Additionally, the RAK12040 can be mounted to sensor slot of WisBlock Base board.
parent_content: RAK12040 is a WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Module that extends the WisBlock system with an AMG8833 chip from Panasonic. It comes with a ready-to-use software library and tutorial, making it easy to build a temperature data acquisition system. Temperature data is interfaced via I2C. Additionally, the RAK12040 can be mounted to sensor slot of WisBlock Base board.

title: RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Datasheet > RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12040 Module Mounting Mechanism on WisBlock Base Board
content:
**Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12040 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12040 module can be mounted on the slots: **A & C**.  
> **Image:** RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Mounting
parent_content:
**Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12040 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12040 module can be mounted on the slots: **A & C**.  
> **Image:** RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Mounting

title: RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Datasheet > RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > Vendor and Part Number Information [TABLE]
RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Datasheet > RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Connector and Pinout
content:
The RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12040 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **Image:** RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Pinout Diagram  
> **TIP:** NOTE  
When the RAK12040 is used with other sensor modules powered by **3V3_S** together, it can not be mounted on slot **A**.
parent_content:
The RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12040 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **Image:** RAK12040 WisBlock 8x8 IR Sensor Pinout Diagram  
> **TIP:** NOTE  
When the RAK12040 is used with other sensor modules powered by **3V3_S** together, it can not be mounted on slot **A**.
